The status is automatically set when an email is sent.


A case will be auto closed after being in Awaiting customer for 20 days.

 

After day 15 a reminder is automatically sent to the passenger regarding closure...

The case is closed


3 months after a case has been closed it will be permanently closed. However, a permanently closed case can be reopened if more action is needed please ask your team lead for assitance.
The case has been escalated to language queue for handling.

Active status for ongoing work.


Case can be submitted to approval.


A support case can be created.


Case can also be redirected/escalated from this status.

Case can only be assigned.


Omni channel is the tool to receive new cases if nothing else is said.

Status is automatically set when a new email is received.

 

Look in the feed of the case for the latest email and take necessary action.

No active work to be conducted from on hold status.


Case should be on hold when waiting for support.


Remember to set Case to in progress before continue working with it.

The case has been handled and the created settlement is waiting to be verified. 


The settlement can be recalled if any further actions or changes is needed.
The settlement has been sent for control.
The settlement has been approved and the payment is waiting for transfer between SAS and the claimants bank.
